Burning Oath.card_desc: [Kindle Soul] Heal for {scale=105|105} over 3s after Healing an ally with Kindle Soul.

Cherish.card_desc: [Kindle Soul] Kindle Soul Heals up to 25% additional Health based on your ally's missing Health and its range is increased by 300%.

Conviction.card_desc: [Pyre Strike] Increase the Stun duration of Pyre Strike by {scale=0.1|0.1}s.

Exterminate.card_desc: [Pyre Strike] When Pyre Strike hits an enemy champion it stops moving until it ends.

Fire Siphon.card_desc: [Wings of Wrath] Heal for {scale=75|75} for each enemy hit with Wings of Wrath.

Hallowed Sight.card_desc: [Pyre Strike] Your weapon shots do not consume Ammo for {scale=1|1}s after hitting an enemy with Pyre Strike.

Ignition.card_desc: [Pyre Strike] Reduce the Coldown of Wings of Wrath by {scale=1|1}s after hitting an enemy with Pyre Strike.

Inner Fire.card_desc: [Kindle Soul] Generate {scale=1|1} Ammo after Healing an ally with Kindle Soul.

Light Forge.card_desc: [Kindle Soul] Reduce the Cooldown of Kindle Soul by {scale=0.25|0.25}s.

Light of Dawn.card_desc: [Kindle Soul] Apply a {scale=50|50}-Health Shield for 2s to allies affected by Kindle Soul.

Pyre Walker.card_desc: [Wings of Wrath] Reduce the Cooldown of Wings of Wrath by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Righteous Path.card_desc: [Wings of Wrath] Increase the travel distance of Wings of Wrath by {scale=10|10}%.

Ruthless.card_desc: [Armor] Decrease the rate of Wrath decay by {scale=10|10}%.

Solar Blessing.card_desc: [Pyre Strike] When Pyre Strike comes in contact with an ally it will stop and Heal anyone in its beam for 300 every 0.05s.

Solar Flare.card_desc: [Pyre Strike] Increase the radius of Pyre Strike by {scale=10|10}%.

Stoke the Fire.card_desc: [Wings of Wrath] Reduce the Cooldown of Pyre Strike by {scale=0.6|0.6}s for each successful hit by Wings of Wrath.

Brennender Schwur.card_desc: [Seelenzündung] Heilst du einen Verbündeten mit Seelenzündung, wirst du anschließend über 3s {scale=105|105} LP geheilt.

Exterminieren.card_desc: [Feuerstrahl] Trifft Feuerstrahl einen gegnerischen Champion, verbleibt der Strahl bis zum Ende der Dauer an Ort und Stelle.

Feuer sch\u00fcren.card_desc: [Flügel des Zorns] Jeder Treffer mit Flügel des Zorns reduziert die Abklingzeit von Feuerstrahl um {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Feuerlauf.card_desc: [Flügel des Zorns] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Flügel des Zorns um {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Feuersog.card_desc: [Flügel des Zorns] Für jeden mit Flügel des Zorns getroffenen Gegner wirst du {scale=75|75} LP geheilt.

Geweihte Sicht.card_desc: [Feuerstrahl] Triffst du einen Gegner mit Feuerstrahl, verbraucht deine Waffe anschließend {scale=1|1}s lang keine Munition.

Gl\u00fchendes Wesen.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=50|50} LP.

Inneres Feuer.card_desc: [Seelenzündung] Heilst du einen Verbündeten mit Seelenzündung, wird anschließend {scale=1|1} Munition erzeugt.

Licht der D\u00e4mmerung.card_desc: [Seelenzündung] Von Seelenzündung betroffene Verbündete erhalten 2s lang einen Schild mit {scale=50|50} LP.

Lichtschmiede.card_desc: [Seelenzündung] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Seelenzündung um {scale=0.25|0.25}s.

Rechtschaffener Weg.card_desc: [Flügel des Zorns] Erhöht die Reichweite von Flügel des Zorns um {scale=10|10}%.

Schonungslos.card_desc: [Rüstung] Reduziert die Rate, mit der Zorn verfällt, um {scale=10|10}%.

Sonneneruption.card_desc: [Feuerstrahl] Erhöht den Radius von Feuerstrahl um {scale=10|10}%.

Sonnensegen.card_desc: [Feuerstrahl] Feuerstrahl stoppt nun bei getroffenen Verbündeten und heilt sie alle 0,05s 300 LP.

Verurteilung.card_desc: [Feuerstrahl] Erhöht die Betäubungsdauer von Feuerstrahl um {scale=0.1|0.1}s.

Wertsch\u00e4tzung.card_desc: [Seelenzündung] Seelenzündung hat eine um 300% höhere Reichweite und heilt basierend auf der fehlenden Gesundheit des Verbündeten bis zu 25% zusätzlich.

Z\u00fcndung.card_desc: [Feuerstrahl] Treffer mit Feuerstrahl reduzieren die Abklingzeit von Flügel des Zorns um {scale=1|1}s.

Attise-flammes.card_desc: [Fulminailes] Le temps de recharge de Frappe ardente diminue de {scale=0.6|0.6}s par coup de Fulminailes réussi.

B\u00e9n\u00e9diction solaire.card_desc: [Frappe ardente] Le projectile de Frappe ardente s'arrête quand il touche un allié. À son contact, les alliés regagnent 300 PV toutes les 0,05s.

Bienveillance.card_desc: [Âme ravivée] La portée d'Âme ravivée augmente de 300%. Son effet redonne jusqu'à 25% de PV supplémentaires selon les PV manquants.

Conviction.card_desc: [Frappe ardente] Frappe ardente étourdit sa cible {scale=0.1|0.1}s de plus.

Dext\u00e9rit\u00e9 et d\u00e9votion.card_desc: [Arme] Votre vitesse de rechargement augmente de {scale=7|7}%.

\u00c9ruption solaire.card_desc: [Frappe ardente] Le rayon de Frappe ardente augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

Exterminatrice.card_desc: [Frappe ardente] Quand Frappe ardente touche un champion ennemi, le projectile s'immobilise jusqu'à la fin de l'effet.

Feu int\u00e9rieur.card_desc: [Âme ravivée] Vous regagnez {scale=1|1} munition(s) quand vous soignez un allié avec Âme ravivée.

Forge de lumi\u00e8re.card_desc: [Âme ravivée] Âme ravivée se recharge {scale=0.25|0.25}s plus vite.

Ignition.card_desc: [Frappe ardente] Le temps de recharge de Fulminailes diminue de {scale=1|1}s si Frappe ardente touche un ennemi.

Lueur de l'aube.card_desc: [Âme ravivée] Âme ravivée donne un bouclier de {scale=50|50} PV qui dure 2s.

Sans piti\u00e9.card_desc: [Armure] Le courroux se dissipe {scale=10|10}% plus lentement.

Serment ardent.card_desc: [Âme ravivée] Vous regagnez {scale=105|105} PV en 3s quand vous soignez un allié avec Âme ravivée.

Siphon de feu.card_desc: [Fulminailes] Vous regagnez {scale=75|75} PV par ennemi touché avec Fulminailes.

Vision sacr\u00e9e.card_desc: [Frappe ardente] Vous ne consommez pas de munitions pendant {scale=1|1}s quand Frappe ardente touche un ennemi.

Voie de la vertu.card_desc: [Fulminailes] La distance de Fulminailes augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

\u5149\u4e4b\u94f8.card_desc: 减少{scale=0.25|0.25}s灵魂燃烧的冷却时间。

\u535a\u7231.card_desc: 灵魂激发将提供额外的治疗量，为治疗目标缺失血量的25%。

\u5723\u5149\u795d\u798f.card_desc: 烈焰冲击碰到队友后将停止移动，并治疗穿过的队友，效果为每0.05s回复300点血量。

\u5723\u5149\u95ea\u8000.card_desc: 增加 {scale=10|10}% 的烈焰冲击半径。

\u5723\u8ff9.card_desc: 烈焰冲击会使被命中的人暴露{scale=2|2}s。

\u5fc3\u7075\u4e4b\u706b.card_desc: 当治疗一名队友时，将回复{scale=1|1}点弹药。

\u6b63\u4e49\u4e4b\u8def.card_desc: 增加愤怒之翼{scale=10|10}%的冲击距离。

\u706b\u7130\u8679\u5438.card_desc: 愤怒之翼击中敌人后将会治疗你自己{scale=50|50}的血量。

\u706d\u7edd.card_desc: 烈焰冲击击中一名敌人后将停止移动直到技能结束。

\u71c3\u70e7.card_desc: 当烈焰冲击击中敌人时，将减少{scale=1|1}s愤怒之翼的冷却时间。

\u71c3\u70e7\u8a93\u7ea6.card_desc: 当你的灵魂激发治疗队友时，也会治疗你自己{scale=105|105}点血量，持续3s。

\u731b\u70c8\u71c3\u70e7.card_desc: [愤怒之翼] 愤怒之翼成功击中敌人后减少烈焰冲击的冷却时间{scale=0.5|0.5}秒。

\u9ece\u660e\u4e4b\u5149.card_desc: 受灵魂激发影响的队友将获得一个{scale=75|75}点的生命护盾，持续2s。

Atizar el fuego.card_desc: [Alas de ira] Se reduce la recarga de Ataque de la Pira en {scale=0.6|0.6}s por cada ataque exitoso de Alas de ira.

Bendici\u00f3n solar.card_desc: [Ataque de la Pira] Cuando Ataque de la Pira alcanza a un aliado, la habilidad se detendrá y curará a cualquiera que esté en su rayo 300 PS cada 0,05s.

Caminante de Fuego.card_desc: [Alas de ira] Reduce la recarga de Alas de ira en {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Camino del bien.card_desc: [Alas de ira] Aumenta la distancia recorrida por Alas de ira un {scale=10|10}%.

Convicci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Ataque de la Pira] La duración de aturdimiento de Ataque de la Pira aumenta en {scale=0.1|0.1}s.

Destreza inmensa.card_desc: [Arma] Tu velocidad de recarga aumenta un {scale=7|7}%.

Exterminar.card_desc: [Ataque de la Pira] Cuando Ataque de la Pira alcanza a un enemigo, este deja de moverse hasta que la habilidad termine.

Forja luz.card_desc: [Encendedor de almas] Se reduce la recarga de Encendedor de almas en {scale=0.25|0.25}s.

Fuego interior.card_desc: [Encendedor de almas] Recuperas {scale=1|1} de munición tras curar a un aliado con Encendedor de almas.

Fulguraci\u00f3n solar.card_desc: [Ataque de la Pira] Aumenta el radio de Ataque de la Pira un {scale=10|10}%.

Ignici\u00f3n.card_desc: [Ataque de la Pira] Se reduce la recarga de Alas de ira en {scale=1|1}s tras alcanzar a un enemigo con Ataque de la Pira.

Implacable.card_desc: [Armadura] Se reduce el ritmo de decadencia de Ira un {scale=10|10}%.

Juramento en llamas.card_desc: [Encendedor de almas] Te curas {scale=105|105} PS durante 3s tras curar a un aliado con Encendedor de almas.

Luz del amanecer.card_desc: [Encendedor de almas] Aplicas un escudo de {scale=50|50} PS durante 2 s a los aliados afectados por Encendedor de almas.

Ser incandescente.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu salud máxima aumenta en {scale=50|50} PS.

Sif\u00f3n de fuego.card_desc: [Alas de ira] Te curas {scale=75|75} PS por cada enemigo que alcanzas con Alas de ira.

Valor.card_desc: [Encendedor de almas] Encendedor de almas cura hasta un 25% adicional según la salud restante de tu aliado y su alcance aumenta un 300%.

Vista Consagrada.card_desc: [Ataque de la Pira] Tus disparos de arma no consumen munición durante {scale=1|1}s tras alcanzar a un enemigo con Ataque de la Pira.

Andarilha da Pira.card_desc: [Ira Alada] Reduz o intervalo da Ira Alada em {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Aumentando o Fogo.card_desc: [Ira Alada] Reduze o intervalo do Ataque Ardente em {scale=0.6|0.6}s a cada ataque bem-sucedido com Ira Alada.

Ben\u00e7\u00e3o Solar.card_desc: [Ataque Ardente] Quando o Ataque Ardente atinge um aliado, ele para e cura qualquer aliado que for banhado pelo feixe em 300 a cada 0,05s.

Brilho Solar.card_desc: [Ataque Ardente] Aumenta a área de Ataque Ardente em {scale=10|10}%.

Caminho Virtuoso.card_desc: [Ira Alada] Aumenta em {scale=10|10}% a distância percorrida pela Ira Alada.

Convic\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Ataque Ardente] Aumenta a duração do atordoamento do Ataque Ardente em {scale=0.1|0.1}s.

Devo\u00e7\u00e3o \u00e0 Destreza.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta em {scale=8|8}% a velocidade em que recarrega a arma.

D\u00ednamo de Calor.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta em {scale=4|4} a sua munição máxima.

Exterm\u00ednio.card_desc: [Ataque Ardente] Quando o Ataque Ardente acerta um Campeão inimigo, ele para de avançar até que sua duração termine.

Fogo Interior.card_desc: [Alma em Chamas] Gera {scale=1|1} de munição após curar um aliado com Alma em Chamas.

Forja de Luz.card_desc: [Alma em Chamas] Reduz o intervalo de Alma em Chamas em {scale=0.25|0.25}s.

Igni\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Ataque Ardente] Reduz o intervalo da Ira Alada em {scale=1|1}s após acertar um inimigo com o Ataque Ardente.

Implac\u00e1vel.card_desc: [Armadura] Diminui em {scale=10|10}% a taxa com que a ira se esvai.

Juramento de Fogo.card_desc: [Alma em Chamas] Você se cura em {scale=105|105} de vida no decorrer de 3s após curar um aliado com Alma em Chamas.

Luz da Manh\u00e3.card_desc: [Alma em Chamas] Aplica um escudo de {scale=50|50} de vida por 2s nos aliados sob efeito da Alma em Chamas.

Ser Incandescente.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a sua vida máxima em {scale=50|50}.

Sif\u00e3o de Fogo.card_desc: [Ira Alada] Você se cura em {scale=75|75} para cada inimigo atingido pela Ira Alada.

Valorizado.card_desc: [Alma em Chamas] Alma em Chamas cura até 25% a mais com base na quantidade de vida que o aliado perdeu, e seu alcance aumenta em 300%.

Vis\u00e3o Sacra.card_desc: [Ataque Ardente] Os disparos da sua arma não consomem munição por {scale=1|1}s após atingir um inimigo com o Ataque Ardente.

\u0411\u043e\u0436\u0435\u0441\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Пламенный удар] В течение {scale=1|1} с. после попадания по врагу Пламенным ударом ваше оружие не расходует боеприпасы.

\u0412\u043d\u0443\u0442\u0440\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Пламя души] Исцеление союзника Пламенем души восстанавливает {scale=1|1} ед. боеприпасов.

\u0412\u043e\u0437\u0433\u043e\u0440\u04.card_desc: [Пламенный удар] Попадание Пламенным ударом сокращает перезарядку Крыльев гнева на {scale=1|1} с.

\u0412\u043e\u0437\u0436\u0438\u0433\u04.card_desc: [Крылья гнева] Попадания Крыльями гнева сокращают перезарядку Пламенного удара на {scale=0.6|0.6} с.

\u0417\u0430\u0431\u043e\u0442\u0430.card_desc: [Пламя души] Пламя души восстанавливает еще до 25% здоровья (зависит от недостающего здоровья союзника), а его дальность увеличивается на 300%.

\u0418\u0441\u0442\u0440\u0435\u0431\u04.card_desc: [Пламенный удар] При попадании по врагу Пламенный удар теперь останавливается до окончания действия.

\u041a\u0443\u0437\u043d\u0438\u0446\u04.card_desc: [Пламя души] Перезарядка Пламени души сокращается на {scale=0.25|0.25} с.

\u041b\u0443\u0447\u0438 \u0440\u0430\u0.card_desc: [Пламя души] Союзники под действием Пламени души получают щит прочностью {scale=50|50} ед. на 2 с.

\u041e\u0441\u043b\u0435\u043f\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье повышается на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u041f\u0438\u0440\u043e\u0433\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Ваш максимальный боезапас повышается на {scale=2|2} ед.

\u041f\u043e\u0442\u043e\u043a \u043e\u0.card_desc: [Крылья гнева] За каждого врага, пораженного Крыльями гнева, вы исцеляетесь на {scale=75|75} ед.

\u041f\u0440\u0430\u0432\u0435\u0434\u04.card_desc: [Крылья гнева] Дальность Крыльев гнева увеличивается на {scale=10|10}%.

\u041f\u044b\u043b\u0430\u044e\u0449\u04.card_desc: [Пламя души] Исцеляя союзника Пламенем души, вы тоже исцеляетесь на {scale=105|105} ед. в течение 3 с.

\u0421\u043e\u043b\u043d\u0435\u0447\u04.card_desc: [Пламенный удар] Радиус Пламенного удара увеличивается на {scale=10|10}%.
[Пламенный удар] Когда Пламенный удар попадает по союзнику, он останавливается и исцеляет всех находящихся в его луче на 300 ед. каждые 0,05 с.

\u0423\u0431\u0435\u0436\u0434\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Пламенный удар] Длительность оглушения Пламенным ударом увеличивается на {scale=0.1|0.1} с.

\u0425\u043e\u0436\u0434\u0435\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Крылья гнева] Перезарядка Крыльев гнева сокращается на {scale=0.6|0.6} с.

Blask.card_desc: [Rozpalenie duszy] Skraca czas odnowienia Rozpalenia duszy o {scale=0.25|0.25} s.

B\u0142ogos\u0142awie\u0144stwo S\u0142o.card_desc: [Żarliwe uderzenie] Kiedy Żarliwe uderzenie wchodzi w kontakt z sojusznikiem, zatrzymuje się i przywraca 300 PZ co 0,05 s każdemu w zasięgu.

Eksterminacja.card_desc: [Żarliwe uderzenie] Kiedy Żarliwe uderzenie trafia wrogiego czempiona, zostaje on zatrzymany do końca trwania tej umiejętności.

Ogniomantka.card_desc: [Skrzydła gniewu] Skraca czas odnowienia Skrzydeł gniewu o {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

Ognista przysi\u0119ga.card_desc: [Rozpalenie duszy] Uleczenie sojusznika Rozpaleniem duszy przywraca {scale=105|105} PZ przez 3 s.

Ognisty wir.card_desc: [Skrzydła gniewu] Każde trafienie wroga Skrzydłami gniewu przywraca ci {scale=75|75} PZ.

Podsycenie ognia.card_desc: [Skrzydła gniewu] Każde udane trafienie Skrzydłami gniewu skraca czas odnowienia Żarliwego uderzenia o {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

Rozb\u0142ysk S\u0142o\u0144ca.card_desc: [Żarliwe uderzenie] Zwiększa zasięg Żarliwego uderzenia o {scale=10|10}%.

Roz\u017carzona istota.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa twoje maks. zdrowie o {scale=50|50} PZ.

\u015acie\u017cka sprawiedliwego.card_desc: [Skrzydła gniewu] Zwiększa dystans pokonany przez Skrzydła gniewu o {scale=10|10}%.

Silna wola.card_desc: [Żarliwe uderzenie] Wydłuża czas trwania ogłuszenia Żarliwego uderzenia o {scale=0.1|0.1} s.

\u015awiat\u0142o \u015bwitu.card_desc: [Rozpalenie duszy] Sojusznicy objęci działaniem Rozpalenia duszy zyskują tarczę o {scale=50|50} pkt. odporności na 2 s.

\u015awi\u0119ty wzrok.card_desc: [Żarliwe uderzenie] Po trafieniu wroga Żarliwym uderzeniem strzały z broni nie zużywają amunicji przez {scale=1|1} s.

Troska.card_desc: [Rozpalenie duszy] Rozpalenie duszy przywraca do 25% dodatkowych PZ w oparciu o brakujące zdrowie twojego sojusznika, a jej zasięg jest zwiększony o 300%.

Wewn\u0119trzny ogie\u0144.card_desc: [Rozpalenie duszy] Uleczenie sojusznika Rozpaleniem duszy przywraca {scale=1|1} szt. amunicji.

Zap\u0142on.card_desc: [Żarliwe uderzenie] Trafienie wroga Żarliwym uderzeniem skraca czas odnowienia Skrzydeł gniewu o {scale=1|1} s.

Alev Sifonu.card_desc: [Gazap Kanatları] Gazap Kanatları ile vurulan her düşman için {scale=75|75} Can İyileş.

Ate\u015fi Harla.card_desc: [Gazap Kanatları] Gazap Kanatları ile yapılan her başarılı vuruşta Yangın Darbesi'nin Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.6|0.6}sn azalt.

Ate\u015fleme.card_desc: [Yangın Darbesi] Yangın Darbesi ile bir düşmana vurduktan sonra Gazap Kanatları'nın Bekleme Süresini {scale=1|1}sn azalt.

Ate\u015fte Y\u00fcr\u00fcyen.card_desc: [Gazap Kanatları] Gazap Kanatları'nın Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.6|0.6}sn azalt.

Ba\u011fr\u0131na Bas.card_desc: [Ruh Tutuşması] Ruh Tutuşması, müttefikinin eksik canına bağlı olarak %25'e kadar ek Can iyileştirir ve menzili %300 artar.

Do\u011fru Yol.card_desc: [Gazap Kanatları] Gazap Kanatları'nın gidiş mesafesini %{scale=10|10} artır.

G\u00fcne\u015f I\u015f\u0131\u011f\u013.card_desc: [Yangın Darbesi] Yangın Darbesi'nin Etki Alanını %{scale=10|10} artır.

G\u00fcne\u015f Kutsamas\u0131.card_desc: [Yangın Darbesi] Yangın Darbesi bir müttefike temas ettiğinde durur ve ışın içindekileri her 0,05 saniyede 300 Can İyileştirir.

\u0130\u00e7imdeki Yang\u0131n.card_desc: [Ruh Tutuşması] Ruh Tutuşması ile bir Müttefiki iyileştirdikten sonra {scale=1|1} Cephane oluştur.

K\u00f6k\u00fcn\u00fc Kurut.card_desc: [Yangın Darbesi] Yangın Darbesi bir şampiyona vurduğunda sona erene kadar hareket etmez.

Kutsal G\u00f6r\u00fc\u015f.card_desc: [Yangın Darbesi] Yangın Darbesi ile bir düşmanı vurduktan sonra silah atışların {scale=1|1}sn boyunca Cephane harcamaz.

Mahkumiyet.card_desc: [Yangın Darbesi] Yangın Darbesi'nin Sersemletme süresini {scale=0.1|0.1}sn artır.

Nurlan.card_desc: [Ruh Tutuşması] Ruh Tutuşması'nın Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.25|0.25} sn azalt.

\u015eafak I\u015f\u0131\u011f\u0131.card_desc: [Ruh Tutuşması] Ruh Tutuşması'ndan etkilenen müttefiklere 2sn boyunca {scale=50|50} Cana sahip bir kalkan sağla.

Yak\u0131c\u0131 Yemin.card_desc: [Ruh Tutuşması] Ruh Tutuşması ile bir müttefiki iyileştirdikten sonra 3 saniyede {scale=105|105} Can İyileş.
